title: HIGH PING AT EVENING TO MIDNIGHT  AFTER PATCH 6.15!!!!
body: Ever since Patch 6.15 on League of Legends, I constantly get 290ms to 310ms from evening to midnight. At morning my ping is decent at 100 ms to 110 ms... Does anyone know how to fix this problem, I can't play league anymore because of this issue

replies.body: It sounds like something might be going wonky in the evening with your network, or your ISP changing the routing to our game servers.  I suggest running a[ log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of what's going.  If possible, I recommend running one for morning as well as midnight.  The results will also provide a list of steps to help get this resolved.  Let me know what you find!
Ok i'll make sure to run one for morning and midnight. Thanks for ur help and i'll make sure to keep u updated ^_^

This is likely due to your network's routing to the LoL servers.

Drop a line with Riot’s [Technical Support Centre.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=34190)


* The primary category has already been chosen. 


* For the secondary category, select **I’m lagging more than normal.**
